attributes.additional_details:
We are calling for tougher action to be taken on "yob culture"
We would like to see tougher sentencing, and the police given more powers to stop these thugs from taking over our streets.
This is our country, and we the taxpayer and law abiding citizens have had enough of the mindless voilence and vandalism witnessed on our streets on a daily basis. Yob culture is at an all time high, it is on the increase, unless something is done now, it will only get worse.
More police in the comunities, tougher sentencing, and the threat of re-introducing National Service might make these "yobs" sit up and take notice.
Problem families on housing estates should be evicted from the society as they are not wanted.
We the taxpayers have had enough of subsidising them through our taxes. It is time the government took our thoughts into consideration and acted upon what WE want in our society.
